'''Past Memories''' is the Normal Attack Talent used by the [[Traveler]] when they have not resonated with an [[element]].

It can be used during the initial Tutorial quest line until [[Unexpected Power]], after which the Traveler will automatically resonate with [[Anemo]]. During the [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter II]] Prologue, the Traveler will switch back to being "unaligned" for [[The Crux Clash]] due to its prohibition on [[Vision]]s, and will use this talent again.

==Aligned Talents==
When the Traveler aligns with an [[Element]], the Normal Attack Talent changes accordingly:
*{{Talent|Foreign Ironwind|30|nobr=1}}
*{{Talent|Foreign Rockblade|30|nobr=1}}
*{{Talent|Foreign Thundershock|30|nobr=1}}
